LanguagData.VPE.PsylinkGained.Desc: {0} has gained a new level of psylink. Upon reaching that level, {1} raised psycasting-related stats slightly. {1} can now also allocate a point to either learn a new psycast, improve psycasting stats further or unlock a new meditation focus.\n\nPsycasting experience needed for next level is: {2}.
